content.description: Monica has just left a biology class in which she learned about animals that live in forests. When she overhears a conversation among some students about “bare necessities,” she thinks they are discussing the types of food that bears need to survive, rather than things that humans need.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best explains Monica’s perception?

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
